en.title: Our Services
en.subtitle: Discover the wide range of services you can book instantly with our AI-powered platform

services.title: Home Services
services.description: Schedule medical appointments and consultations with ease. Connect with doctors, specialists and healthcare providers in your area.

services.title: Salon Appointments
services.description: Professional beauty services including hair styling, manicures, facials and spa treatments from certified professionals.

services.title: Restaurant Booking
services.description: Reserve tables at top restaurants and cafes. Enjoy fine dining experiences with instant confirmation and special offers.

services.title: Home Cleaning
services.description: Professional cleaning services for your home. Deep cleaning, regular maintenance and specialized cleaning solutions.

services.title: Transportation
services.description: Reliable transportation services including taxi, ride-sharing and luxury car rentals for all your travel needs.

services.title: Spa & Wellness
services.description: Rejuvenating spa treatments, massage therapy and wellness services to refresh your mind and body.

additionalServices.title: Pet Care Services
additionalServices.description: Comprehensive pet care including grooming, veterinary services and pet sitting from certified professionals.

additionalServices.title: Event Planning
additionalServices.description: Professional event planning services for weddings, corporate events and special occasions.

additionalServices.title: Personal Training
additionalServices.description: One-on-one fitness training sessions with certified personal trainers to achieve your health goals.

additionalServices.title: Food Delivery
additionalServices.description: Fast and reliable food delivery from your favorite restaurants with real-time tracking.

additionalServices.title: Tutoring Services
additionalServices.description: Expert tutoring in various subjects from qualified educators for students of all ages.

additionalServices.title: Home Repairs
additionalServices.description: Professional home repair and maintenance services including plumbing, electrical and general repairs.

additionalServices.title: Car Rental
additionalServices.description: Affordable car rentals for short and long-term needs with a wide selection of vehicles.

additionalServices.title: Photography
additionalServices.description: Professional photography services for events, portraits and commercial projects.

additionalServices.title: Catering Services
additionalServices.description: Premium catering services for all occasions with customizable menus and professional service.

de.title: Unsere Dienstleistungen
de.subtitle: Entdecken Sie die große Auswahl an Services, die Sie sofort über unsere KI-gestützte Plattform buchen können

services.title: Haus-Services
services.description: Vereinbaren Sie medizinische Termine und Beratungen mühelos. Verbinden Sie sich mit Ärzten, Spezialisten und Anbietern in Ihrer Nähe.

services.title: Salon-Termine
services.description: Professionelle Beauty-Services inkl. Haarstyling, Maniküre, Gesichtsbehandlungen und Spa-Angebote von zertifizierten Profis.

services.title: Restaurant-Reservierung
services.description: Reservieren Sie Tische in Top-Restaurants & Cafés. Feines Essen mit Sofortbestätigung und speziellen Angeboten genießen.

services.title: Hausreinigung
services.description: Professionelle Reinigung: Grundreinigung, laufende Pflege und spezialisierte Lösungen für ein sauberes Zuhause.

services.title: Transport
services.description: Zuverlässige Transportdienste: Taxi, Ride-Sharing und Premium-Mietwagen für alle Reisebedürfnisse.

services.title: Spa & Wellness
services.description: Regenerierende Spa-Behandlungen, Massagen und Wellness-Angebote zur Erholung von Körper und Geist.

additionalServices.title: Haustierbetreuung
additionalServices.description: Umfassende Betreuung: Pflege, Tierarzt-Services und Pet-Sitting durch qualifizierte Fachkräfte.

additionalServices.title: Eventplanung
additionalServices.description: Professionelle Planung für Hochzeiten, Firmenveranstaltungen und besondere Anlässe – stressfrei & kreativ.

additionalServices.title: Personal Training
additionalServices.description: Individuelle Fitness-Sessions mit zertifizierten Trainern zur Erreichung Ihrer Gesundheitsziele.

additionalServices.title: Essenslieferung
additionalServices.description: Schnelle & zuverlässige Lieferung Ihrer Lieblingsgerichte mit Echtzeit-Tracking.

additionalServices.title: Nachhilfe
additionalServices.description: Qualifizierte Nachhilfe in verschiedenen Fächern – für Lernende aller Altersstufen.

additionalServices.title: Hausreparaturen
additionalServices.description: Fachgerechte Reparatur & Wartung: Sanitär, Elektrik und allgemeine Instandhaltung.

additionalServices.title: Autovermietung
additionalServices.description: Flexible Mietwagen für kurz- und langfristige Nutzung mit großer Fahrzeugauswahl.

additionalServices.title: Fotografie
additionalServices.description: Professionelle Fotografie für Events, Portraits und Business-Projekte.

additionalServices.title: Catering
additionalServices.description: Hochwertiges Catering mit flexiblen Menüs und professionellem Service für jeden Anlass.
